title: ‘Prophet’ Lee Kaplan convicted for sex with 6 young ‘sister wives’
itunes:title: ‘Prophet’ Lee Kaplan convicted for sex with 6 young ‘sister wives’
description:
A Pennsylvania man “gifted” a half-dozen underage girls to be his “sister wives” could spend the rest of his life in prison after being found guilty of sexual assault. Nancy Grace and Alan Duke discuss the shocking case of Lee Kaplan in this episode.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
